QuestData.Title: Engineering a Disaster
QuestData.Description: These goblin goons and their minions have decided that they own this pillar and its crystals. I came here to explore the crystals and take samples, but they overpowered me and won't let me return to the camp.$B$BIf you'll help me fight our way out of here, we can teach these thugs a lesson they'll never forget!
QuestData.AreaDescription: Escort Engineer Helice out of Swindlegrin's Dig
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Engineer Helice escape from Swindlegrin's Dig, then speak with Hemet Nesingwary at the Nesingwary Base Camp.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Hemet Nesingwary at Nesingwary Base Camp in Sholazar Basin.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for freeing Helice and seeing to her safe return. We all started to get worried when she didn't return from her crystal hunting trip.
